snippet.title: Lurks Within Walls | Horror Game Awards October Showcase Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
LURKS WITHIN WALLS is a tense survival horror game combining modern dungeon RPGs' exploration elements with fast-paced turn-based combat. Explore a series of cursed environments filled with terrifying creatures illustrated by the renowned artist Trevor Henderson.

STEAM LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3197890/LURKS_WITHIN_WALLS/

#thehorrorgameawards #HorrorGamesShowcase
---
The Horror Game Awards started towards the end of 2022 as a Horror Game of the Year Award set up by two die hard horror game fans. Fourteen content creators made up that year’s jury. It was such a success that in 2023 the jury doubled in size and the awards expanded their scope.

The aim of the awards is simple: to celebrate horror as one of the best genres in video games and to recognise the year’s greatest horror games alongside the developers who make them.

Website: https://thehorrorgameawards.com/
Merch: https://store.thehorrorgameawards.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TheHorrorGameAwards

Discord: https://discord.gg/j8wUUzJQ8D
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HorrorGameAward
Instagram: https://instagram.com/thehorrorgameawards
